byline.original: By KAREN CROUSE and IAN LOVETT
byline.contributor: Karen Crouse reported from Oakland, Calif., and Ian Lovett from Los Angeles.

abstract: Oakland Raiders fans mourn loss of team owner Al Davis, who was with Raiders as coach, general manager and owner for nearly 50 years and saw team win three championships in five Super Bowl appearances.
snippet: For followers of the team in Oakland and Los Angeles, its former home, any relationship with Al Davis tended to be complicated.
lead_paragraph: For followers of the team in Oakland and Los Angeles, its former home, any relationship with Al Davis tended to be complicated.

headline.main: Raiders Fans Mourn an Owner Loved and Otherwise
headline.print_headline: Raiders Fans Mourn an Owner Loved and Otherwise
headline.seo: Raiders Fans Mourn Owner Al Davis
